data.message: First time i EVER in 20 years cut off listening to em spit anything.  He sounds just like another libtard crybaby who's out of touch with politics.  Screamin boo hoo from his million dollar estate.  How much had he helped his own state with his "fame and stature"? Detroit is a fkn wasteland and the epitome of whats goin wrong in america.  Pretty sure he is back on the drugs..

replies.message: So he's a 'libtard crybaby' bc he said something you don't like? Sounds like someone needs to check their diaper.

Geeeez. He is against a president he dislikes like he dislike another Republican President, He made songs about Bush, went as far as saying "Fuck Bush".  Listen to his past music, you seem new to his music.
The amount of money he has put in to Detroit is probably more than you will make in a life time

"Screamin boo hoo from his million dollar estate."

HAHAHAHAHAHAHHA

It seriously takes a Trump supporter to say something profound and not realize that's exactly what Trump does every weekend he goes to spend taxpayer cash at his luxury golf resorts, rather than stay in the White House he thinks of as a "Venezuelan jail".

Yeah..trump is the only president in us history who donates his salary.  He actually pays out of pocket for his trips..the taxpayers merely pay for security.  But you libtards wouldnt know that since half of you arent above a 4th grade reading level.  Obams also took golf outings and frequent vacations..so did bush..clinton..wait a minute...every president did.  So yeah..come up with something legit to belittle trump about.  And em complained for a fucking decade about everything..so he is exactly like trump.  I cant even tell you how many bars he spit about not getting 5 mics.  Cmon..dont you libtards use the internet for anything more than ignorant postings, streaming or pictures.  Theres this thing called a library.  It has lots of books.  Some of them might even have pictures and areas u can color in.  Perhaps you'll find some pop up books..which are right about at your IQ level.  Maybe then you can read about how to purge your suboxin habits and not drain the economy cuz yur fkn junkies.  U kids are too ez.

I agree Adam!!! But then again,it must REALLY suck being Em,raised in the projects,not like the rest of us white kids in the burbs who was able to know what it was like to be a kid w/o having to brown nose just to survive going to school and outside to play! This is all about his childhood survival and PTSD ,having no choice but to make the best of what only his mother was willing and able to give. While we went to roller rinks,birthday parties,chuck e cheeses and safe parks & playgrounds or to grandmas house,he was shut in a trailer or roaming around the ghetto sucking butts to survive and the only thing to do was to hang in the hood and learn to live THEIR way. yeah,this wasnt a choice,how does it feel knowing your entire life,your attitude and behavior and your style was all based upon what you only had and could make of it vs what you really preferred,wished you could of had and wanted. Didnt judge you for so many years,but since you went there and decided to judge all of us,those who does support our new potus or decided to give him a chance,since it is what it is, and what we got,you screwed up. What a smack in so many of your fans faces! That supported you during your effed up years. Since you chose to be SO blunt,i decided to be just as Blunt back! Regardless how i was raised in the suburbs,I was still also raised,if one swings first,dont hesitate to swing back! You swung first!
